sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-terms', templateUrl: './terms.component.html', styleUrls: ['./terms.component.scss'] }) export class TermsComponent { }

GoldTender's Terms and Conditions

1. Introduction

Welcome to GoldTender's, an ethical and legal online gambling site. By using this site, you agree to comply with these Terms and Conditions (the "Terms"). Please read them carefully before continuing to use the site.

2. Eligibility

2.1. To use GoldTender's, you must be of the legal age to participate in gambling activities in your jurisdiction of residence. If you do not meet this requirement, you may not use this site.

2.2. It is your responsibility to ensure that the use of GoldTender's complies with local and national laws and regulations in your jurisdiction.

3. User Account

3.1. To access certain features of GoldTender's, you may need to create a user account. You must provide accurate and up-to-date information during registration.

3.2. You are responsible for the confidentiality of your login information and the activity that occurs under your account.

4. Responsible Gambling

4.1. GoldTender's promotes responsible gambling. We encourage our users to set gambling limits and seek assistance from resources for compulsive gambling if needed.

5. Deposits and Withdrawals

5.1. All financial transactions on GoldTender's are subject to our deposit and withdrawal terms, available on the site.

6. Security

6.1. You are responsible for the security of your account and the use of your password. You must inform us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

7. Intellectual Property

7.1. All content, logos, trademarks, and other elements on GoldTender's are protected by intellectual property rights and may not be used without prior written permission.

8. Changes to the Terms

8.1. GoldTender's reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes. By continuing to use the site after such modifications, you agree to the new Terms.

9. Termination

9.1. GoldTender's reserves the right to terminate your account and deny access to the site at any time for non-compliance with these Terms or any illegal or fraudulent activity.

10. Contact

10.1. For any questions regarding these Terms, please contact us at contact@email.com.
